original_title: Atlas World introduces innovative Quiz Master Mobile App to enhance Sri Lanka’s student learning
original_body_lines: Atlas, the premier learning brand in Sri Lanka that has been a cornerstone in local education for over 65 years, provides significant support to overcome the unique educational challenges of children in this country. The company created Atlas World to provide additional educational knowledge to children, elevating Sri Lankan students into a unique learning environment.

It delivers several benefits including expanding educational opportunities for children through specially designed learning methods, creating digital innovations that enable children to study in their own way, and conducting free online classes to provide knowledge to children beyond school education. Atlas World’s newest educational addition is the launch of the Quiz Master mobile app.

The Quiz Master mobile app was launched on 15th August to help create winners out of Grade 5 students preparing for their scholarship examination. Although there are mobile apps that include the general lessons covering the syllabus for children in Sri Lanka, mobile apps that help them methodically prepare for the Grade 5 Scholarship exam are rare.

Given such a situation, the Quiz Master mobile app introduced under the Atlas World educational program help these children to successfully prepare for the exam by using AI technology to identify each student’s learning habits.

This app also has the unique ability to come up with probable questions for the scholarship exam, while simultaneously making the scholarship revision studies more engaging by choosing the most suitable method for the children.
By providing them educational and exam content through audio, visual and kinesthetics, students are systematically taken towards new horizons in their educational journeys.

This is an app whose content is available in all three languages (Sinhala, English and Tamil) and your child can practice questions in a language that is convenient for them. A key feature of the app is that parents are able to closely monitor the progress and view the results of their child’s preparation for the exam.

Atlas World educational program aims to provide successful educational solutions for the children of today. This educational mobile app has been introduced after certification by a panel of experts in the field of education, and therefore will be a comprehensive, invaluable guide for students to achieve success in the Grade 5 Scholarship exam. Through this self learning app all students are trained to face probable exam questions by identifying a pattern of questions that are ideally-suited for each of them based on their approach to their studies and their personal preferences. This ensures that each student is able to have a personalized exam revision experience, and therefore they can prepare with the same level of enthusiasm and engagement leading up to the exam.
